name: NU_EhrlichiosisTestsForEhrlichiaSpeciesIgMIgGAntibodyQuantitative
title: NU_Ehrlichiosis (Tests for Ehrlichia species IgM IgG Antibody) [Quantitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Ehrlichia species IgM or IgG Antibody (Quantitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Ehrlichia IgG or IgM Ab;  
LOINC search: "ehrlichia -anaplasma (IgM OR IgG) Ab Scale:Qn -panel" AND "ehrlichia IgG+IgM Ab -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: Panel tests; Non-quantitative tests)
